alert.note: Alert for Brown; Kewaunee; Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:53AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BROWN...WESTERN KEWAUNEE AND EAST CENTRAL OUTAGAMIE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM CDT... At 552 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Bay, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Green Bay and Bellevue Town around 600 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Little Rapids, Oneida, De Pere, Lambeau Field, Ledgeview, Hobart, Leo Frigo Bridge, Suamico, Little Suamico, and Howard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
